HomePage.title: Transform Your Space with AI
HomePage.subtitle: Upload a photo of your room and get personalized design suggestions powered by artificial intelligence

UploadForm.title: Upload Your Room Photo
UploadForm.subtitle: Take or upload a clear photo of your room to get started
UploadForm.uploadZone: Drag and drop your image here, or click to select

ErrorPage.title: Something went wrong
ErrorPage.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

NotFoundPage.title: Page not found
NotFoundPage.description: The requested page could not be found. It may have been moved or no longer exists.
NotFoundPage.additionalLinks: Or visit one of these pages:

SelectModePage.title: What would you like to do?
SelectModePage.subtitle: Your image has been uploaded. Choose an option for further processing.
SelectModePage.analyzeSpaceDescription: Let AI analyze your room and get personalized design suggestions
SelectModePage.changeStyleDescription: Transform your room into different interior styles
SelectModePage.loadingSubtitle: Your room design suggestions are being created. Please be patient.

errors.tooLarge: The image is too large. Please use a smaller image (max 5MB).
errors.noSuggestions: No suggestions could be generated. Please upload an image of an interior space (living room, bedroom, kitchen, etc.).
errors.defaultError: An error occurred during analysis. Please try again with another image.
errors.aiError: AI analysis is currently unavailable. Please try again in a moment.
errors.processingMessage: The AI response could not be processed. Please try again with another image.
errors.imageNotFoundMessage: The image could not be found. Please upload a new image.
errors.dataFormatMessage: There was a problem with the data format. Please try again or upload another image.
errors.connectionMessage: The connection to the server failed. Check your internet connection and try again.
errors.configMessage: There is a problem with the server configuration. Please try again in a few minutes or contact support.
errors.imageTooBigMessage: The selected image is too large for processing. Please use a smaller image (recommended: under 5MB) or compress the image.

BuyCreditsPage.title: Buy Credits
BuyCreditsPage.subtitle: Buy credits to analyze your rooms and apply design suggestions. Credits never expire and are immediately credited to your account.
BuyCreditsPage.notAuthenticated: Please log in to buy credits.
BuyCreditsPage.securityNotice: Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card information.
BuyCreditsPage.paymentSuccess: Payment successful! Your credits have been added.
BuyCreditsPage.loginRequired: Please log in to buy credits.
BuyCreditsPage.purchaseError: Error starting the purchase process. Please try again.

AuthPage.title: Welcome to RoomVibe
AuthPage.subtitle: Sign in to transform your space with AI
AuthPage.termsPrivacy: By continuing, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

PrivatePage.noGeneratedImages: No generated images found for user

SuggestionsPage.title: Design Suggestions
SuggestionsPage.subtitle: Choose a suggestion to transform your room
SuggestionsPage.notEnoughCreditsError: Not enough credits! You need {credits} credits to apply a suggestion.

ChangeStylePage.title: Change Interior Style
ChangeStylePage.subtitle: Select a style from our gallery and transform your room with just one click.
ChangeStylePage.notEnoughCreditsError: Not enough credits! You need {credits} credits to apply a style.

SettingsPage.settingsDescription: Configure mock APIs for development to save costs during frequent testing.
SettingsPage.mockImageAnalysisDesc: Uses mock data instead of the OpenAI Vision API for room analysis. Saves API costs during development.
SettingsPage.mockImageGenerationDesc: Uses existing sample images instead of the Replicate API for image generation. Saves API costs during development.
SettingsPage.mockFileUploadDesc: Simulates file uploading without actually using Supabase Storage. Saves API costs and enables offline development.
SettingsPage.developmentNotice: These settings are intended for development only. In production mode, the real APIs should always be used.

quality.title: Professional Quality

intelligence.title: Smart Adaptation

affordable.title: Fair Pricing
affordable.description: Free credits to start, then pay only for what you actually use.
